text: tatha ham rasoolon ko nahin bhejate, parantu shubh soochana dene vaale aur saavadhaan karane vaale banaakar aur jo kaafir hain, asaty (anrt) ke sahaare vivaad karate hain, taaki usake dvaara ve saty ko neecha[1] dikhaayen aur unhonne banaaya hamaaree aayaton ko tatha jis baat kee unhen chetaavanee dee gaee, parihaas
